Package org.neo4j.dbms.database

Class AbstractSystemGraphComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.dbms.database.AbstractSystemGraphComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SystemGraphComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbmsRuntimeSystemGraphComponent, DefaultSystemGraphComponent, UserSecurityGraphComponent
    public abstract class AbstractSystemGraphComponent
extends Object
implements SystemGraphComponent
    Common code for all system graph components, apart from test implementations and the central collection class SystemGraphComponents.

      • initializeSystemGraph

        public void initializeSystemGraph​(GraphDatabaseService system)
                           throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: SystemGraphComponent
        If the component-specific sub-graph of the system database is not initialized yet (empty), this method should populate it with the default contents for the current version of the component.
        Specified by:
        initializeSystemGraph in interface SystemGraphComponent
        Throws:
        Exception - on any possible error raised by the initialization process
